label: PMNS Theta12 Tribimaximal
mathematical_goal: Derive the solar neutrino mixing angle theta_12 from tribimaximal base with G2 correction
theoretical_significance: The PMNS mixing angle theta_12 (solar angle) is derived from tribimaximal mixing sin^2(theta_12) = 1/3, modified by a Hopf fibration correction. The tribimaximal pattern emerges from the discrete symmetry structure of G2. The small correction of -0.02 shifts the angle from 35.26 deg to 33.41 deg, matching NuFit 6.0 data to 0.1 sigma.
